amendment.description: To ensure Department of Justice conference spending does not fund excessive junkets, lavish meals, or organizations linked to terrorism.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3230 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3230 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator Coburn to Amendment SA 3215. (consideration: CR S12717; text: CR S12717) To ensure Department of Justice conference spending does not fund excessive junkets, lavish meals, or organizations linked to terrorism.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3230 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator Coburn to Amendment SA 3215.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3230 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
